title: Pray to God (song)
text:
"Pray to God" is a song by Scottish DJ and record producer <a href="Calvin%20Harris">Calvin Harris</a>, featuring vocals from American <a href="rock%20music">rock</a> band <a href="Haim%20%28band%29">Haim</a>. It was released on 2 February 2015 as the sixth and final single from Harris' fourth studio album, "<a href="Motion%20%28Calvin%20Harris%20album%29">Motion</a>" (2014). The song attained moderate commercial success, reaching the top 10 in Australia, whilst claiming a top 40 position in the United Kingdom—his second single to miss the top 10 since 2010. The song is co-produced and co-written by Haim's regular producer <a href="Ariel%20Rechtshaid">Ariel Rechtshaid</a>.
Composition.
"Pray to God" is a <a href="House%20music">house</a> song. According to the sheet music published at MusicNotes.com, it is written in the key of <a href="G%20minor">G minor</a>. It has a tempo of 126 bpm. Daniel Kreps of "<a href="Rolling%20Stone">Rolling Stone</a>" said the song recalled <a href="Fleetwood%20Mac">Fleetwood Mac</a>-esque harmonies.
Music video.
The music video for "Pray to God" was directed by <a href="Emil%20Nava">Emil Nava</a> and premiered on 10 February 2015.
The video features Haim wearing all-black clothes in a variety of natural settings, including snow-capped mountains and the woods, surrounded by animals such as wolves, rabbits, bears, eagles, and lions, and riding horses.
Personnel.
Credits adapted from the liner notes of "<a href="Motion%20%28Calvin%20Harris%20album%29">Motion</a>".
